title: Inside Visma’s Strategic Blunder at Dwars: ‘We Should Have Attacked One After Another’
content:
Matteo Jorgenson on Dwars finale: 'We decided to go for the sprint with Wout, and that was the wrong decision.'

Read the full article at Inside Visma’s Strategic Blunder at Dwars: ‘We Should Have Attacked One After Another’ on Velo.
author: ahood
